content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the main point of disagreement?
name: Evaluator

content: The main point of disagreement was that the landlord, Peter Schmidt, wanted to rent the apartment out for the highest price possible. The prices I suggested, starting from 700 Euro and going up to 1100 Euro, were not high enough for his liking.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The conversation did not reach a final price agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo
